title: Genkaku Picasso, Vol. 1
description: Having cheated death, Hikaru Hamura must save himself by using his artistic abilities to help others.Hikari Hamura, nicknamed Picasso because of his natural artistic abilities, survived a horrible accident, but his friend Chiaki wasn't so lucky. Suddenly, Chiaki appears in front of him and tells him in order to keep living he must help the people around him. Can Hikari save people with his sketchbook and a 2B pencil?
author: Usamaru Furuya
